title: Pioneer Agronomy Insights: Enlist and the Importance of Pre-Emerge Herbicides

tasks.task: Discuss incorporating pre-emergent herbicides into weed control programs for resistant weeds and resistance management.
subtasks: Explain Larry Lunder's role as a field agronomist for Pioneer Seeds.
Highlight the important function of pre-emergent herbicides in weed control.
Address concerns about pre-emergent herbicides when rainfall is uncertain.
Explain how pre-emergent herbicides provide additional modes of action.
Describe the benefits of using pre-emergent herbicides against resistant weeds like kochia.
Discuss how pre-emergent herbicides extend the effectiveness of post-emergent herbicides.
Mention the current resistance issues with glyphosate, group two, and group one herbicides.
Emphasize the need for judicious herbicide use to maintain their effectiveness.
Mention demonstrations of pre-emergent technologies in North Dakota and northwest Minnesota.
Invite viewers to tour the demonstration plots in July.
Conclude with the statement that cleaner fields result in higher yields.
